title: A plot twist for Saudi's female film students
text:
A plot twist for Saudi's female film students 3:59pm GMT - 01:59 
Students at Saudi Arabia's first film school are now one step closer to seeing their work on the big screen as the country's decades-long ban on cinema is lifted. Emily Wither reports from Jeddah. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Students at Saudi Arabia's first film school are now one step closer to seeing their work on the big screen as the country's decades-long ban on cinema is lifted. Emily Wither reports from Jeddah.
